code: import{produce}from'immer';const USER_PHONE='userinfo/USER_PHONE';export const userPhone=cell=>({type:USER_PHONE,cell});const initialState={cell:''};function userInfo(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:initialState;let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case USER_PHONE:return produce(state,draft=>{draft.cell=action.cell;});default:return state;}}export default userInfo;
